jcr:content.jcr:description: Adobe® Experience Cloud gives you more ways to maximize and measure your impact.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe® Experience Cloud
jcr:content.description: Adobe® Experience Cloud Connection allows Marketers to synchronize assets between On-Premise/Managed Services AEM Assets and Adobe® Experience Cloud
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: Adobe® Experience Cloud Connection allows Marketers to synchronize assets between On-Premise/Managed Services AEM Assets and Adobe® Experience Cloud. It fosters collaboration with Creatives on Adobe® Creative Cloud. It also allows publishing of approved assets to other Adobe Experience Cloud Solutions.
